name: Garage Utilities
description: Adds extra features to the garage: filtering and sorting, arrows to unlock info popup, and more.

disable-unlocking-free-icons.name: Disable Unlocking Free Icons
disable-unlocking-free-icons.description: Unlocking the free icons you used to get for rating the game is broken in 2.2; this mod unlocks those icons when you click on them (unlocking the Meltdown rate icon is enabled if you have More Games by BitZ enabled).

disable-item-info-popup-animation-name-c.name: Disable Item Info Popup Animation Name Change
disable-item-info-popup-animation-name-c.description: Normally the animations are called 'Items' and they go from 18 to 21; this mod renames them to 'Animations' and makes them go from 1 to 3.
